CustomField.formula:
IF( Quantity__c = Received_Quantity__c, "Match",
IF(AND(Received_Quantity__c <> 0, Quantity__c > Received_Quantity__c),"Lower Quantity Received",
IF( Received_Quantity__c = 0,"Not Received",
IF(AND(Quantity__c <> 0, Quantity__c < Received_Quantity__c),"Higher Quantity Received",
IF( Quantity__c = 0 && Received_Quantity__c >= 1,"Received but not Requested",
"Missing Quantity Data")))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field displays results based on comparison between the Quantity that was requested and the Received Quantity prescribed by the GP.
CustomField.label: Product Prescribed Status
